body: Dear Group Does anyone here have any C source code toobtain either the Y-X dimensions or the aspect ratio from a Radiance *.pic file ? Also, does anyone here know if there are any tools available to reorient (i.e. change surface normal direction) of a polygon primitive in Radiance. Thanks Marcus D.
